div.p: T.J.P., D.G.F. and L.J.D. co-conceived the study. T.J.P., D.G.F., L.J.D. and S.B. participated in the fieldwork. L.J.D. sub-sampled the core profiles and developed the age-depth model. L.J.D., S.B., S.W.S. and E.J.S. performed water isotope analysis. T.J.P. and S.W.S. analysed the water isotope data and developed the climate interpretation and the reconstruction. T.J.P. wrote the majority of the manuscript, and D.G.F., L.J.D., S.B., S.W.S. and E.J.S. co-wrote the manuscript.
